short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MarketBasePlus is a Chrome extension that provides accurate corporate contact information to help prospect and close deals faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MarketBasePlus LinkedIn companion

We made a tool that helps you get up close and personal with your potential customers and close the deal faster and smarter. 
•	The MarketBasePlus Chrome extension sits in your browser: when you log in to LinkedIn, you just find the prospect you need to know more about, and then you click to see real, accurate and up-to-date corporate contact information about them, including business emails and phone numbers.
•	Access all sorts of prospect data: corporate emails, phone numbers, business information, industry codes, decision making unit details and more.  
•	Protected by the MarketBasePlus Data Guarantee: Our data is high-quality, trustworthy and verified. We guarantee it! If you run into something that doesn't seem quite right, let us know, and we’ll refund you for up to 15% of your credits each month.
•	It’s scalable, and doesn’t have to cost the world: This isn’t a solution only designed for big enterprises—we have different options for our users that start from, well, nothing at all! 
With hundreds of thousands of corporate contacts available, all you have to do is click and choose, then watch our extension peel back the curtains so you can take a peek at all the juicy details!

Are you ready to supercharge your sales?
